it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Game

Class ClientRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Game.ClientRegion

  • public class ClientRegion
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is the client-side representation of the server-side concept of Region. Because client only show information on the screen, the information contained into this class (like all the classes of the client-side game model) is really less then the server-side equivalent class.
    • actionSpaces: list of action spaces contained into this region
    • type: the type of this region
    See Also:
    ClientActionSpace

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<ClientActionSpace> actionSpaces 
      private java.lang.String type 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientRegion(java.lang.String type, com.eclipsesource.json.JsonArray actionSpaces)
      initialize the region with the type indicated and setting up its action spaces according to the content of the actionSpaces JsonArray passed as argument, which is directly taken from the GMSTRT message

      • ClientRegion

        public ClientRegion(java.lang.String type,
                    com.eclipsesource.json.JsonArray actionSpaces)
        initialize the region with the type indicated and setting up its action spaces according to the content of the actionSpaces JsonArray passed as argument, which is directly taken from the GMSTRT message
        Parameters:
        type - the type of this region
        actionSpaces - a JsonArray of JSON action spaces
